changes.comment: ContextualMenu: SplitButtons in ContextualMenus are incorrectly using the menuLauncher portion of the splitButton for the tagrate when the  menuLauncher portion is  activated. This can lead to weird overhangs of the parent menu even if  directionalHintFixed is not true (e.g. it will overlap the primary portion of the  splitButton and potentially other items in the parent menu)
